seg.quote: ...a small package wrapped in tissue paper.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is packaged
, je shranjeno v varovalni karton in pripravljeno za prodajo.

seg.quote: The cereal is packaged in plain boxes.

sense.def:
A package
je tudi skupina predlogov, ki jih lahko sprejmemo ali zavrnemo edino vse skupaj.

seg.quote: ...the announcement of a fresh package of spending cuts.
They offered a package worth sixty million dollars.
